column4: I am very new I have a asus g50vt-x5 I cant get anything to work properly. I even got a linux book. I am at my wits end. Please help.
what exactly is the problem? Is there an error output?
do you have a black screen after installing Ubuntu or right after starting from the CD?
no the install was good. but the devices are not fuctionning
what ubuntu version did you install?
did you try system->administration->hardwaredrivers (i'm not sure if thats exactly how the names are, cause I use the german version) ?
if there is nothing more than the nvidia driver, then maybe you should try to look if your hardware actually is supported
just a moment. I'll look for a link
ok will it fix just the wireless? i have tried copying that 2 ucode file into the lid/firmware already
I just want to know if your hardware is supported, I wasn't talking about a fix
sorry ok. at the links what am I looking for
I know I have the intel wifi 5100
what does ifconfig (in terminal) give you?
I think its not about your wlan. It must be the networkmanager...
I think there is a bug at work... http://www.mail-archive.com/ubuntu-bugs@lists.ubuntu.com/msg1459513.html
